properties.HED: 12K sf Lincoln Park mansion sells for $12M
properties.DEK: Price for North Howe Street home was highest in Chicago since 2018
properties.description_link: The year is not done yet, and neither are agents netting jaw-dropping prices for high-end homes.

properties.HED: Lincoln Park mansion sells for record-breaking $11.9M
properties.DEK: Custom-built home bests record set in August 2018
properties.description_link: A mansion in Lincoln Park sold for $11.9 million, setting the record for Chicago’s most expensive home sale since August 2018. It’s also the highest price paid for a single residential property in the city in 2020, Crain’s reported.

properties.HED: Here are Chicago’s 10 biggest investment sales of 2020
properties.DEK: Office deals led the pack, including sale of McDonald’s HQ in Fulton Market and Michael Shvo’s purchase of “Big Red” tower in Downtown
properties.description_link: As with most other cities, Chicago’s commercial real estate market went off the rails in 2020, upending what had been a promising start to the year. Demand for office space tanked, hotels emptied out leaving owners struggling to pay their loans and Covid restrictions strangled retailers whose customers dared to venture into brick-and-mortar stores.

properties.HED: Here are Chicago’s priciest residential sales of 2020
properties.DEK: 5 of top 10 were in Winnetka as buyers headed for burbs
properties.description_link: The pandemic pushed many Chicago luxury buyers out of the city and into the burbs, as five of the 10 priciest residential properties that sold in Cook County in 2020 were in tony Winnetka.

properties.HED: Harrison Street raises $720M for life sciences real estate fund
properties.DEK: Chicago-based firm collected amount in 60 days; target raise is $2B
properties.description_link: In the Covid era, demand for life sciences properties continues to rise and investors are paying attention.
properties.geo_address: 2430 North Halsted Street and Harrison Street Chicago, IL

properties.HED: 601W Cos. is again betting big on Chicago office market
properties.DEK: Redeveloper of Old Post Office is plowing $180M into 801 S. Canal
properties.description_link: 601W Companies, which transformed the hulking but deteriorating Old Post Office into a modern multi-tenant office building, is taking on another major redevelopment project nearby.

properties.HED: Christian Science church teams with condo developer
properties.DEK: 7-story luxury development would rise above Lincoln Park Beaux-Arts property
properties.description_link: A Christian Science congregation will partner with condo developer Ogden Properties rather than sell its historic Lincoln Park church.
properties.geo_address: 2700 North Pine Grove Avenue Chicago, IL

properties.HED: Developers Crescent Heights, Interforum bet big on Chicago
properties.DEK: Separate proposals combine for 1K+ apartment units and 300-key hotel downtown
properties.description_link: Two developers are proposing separate high-rise projects in downtown Chicago that would bring a total of nearly 1,200 units of housing and a 300-key hotel.

properties.HED: Flex-office provider Industrious sued by landlord
properties.DEK: Stockbridge Capital Group alleges startup breached contract
properties.description_link: Flex-office startup Industrious has been sued by the owner of an eight-story building at 600 West Jackson Boulevard for alleged fraud, breach of contract and a violation of Illinois’ Uniform Fraudulent Transfer Act.

properties.HED: Loop office tower faces foreclosure after conversion fails
properties.DEK: Musa Tadros planned to create apartments including 505-bed co-living portion
properties.description_link: A high-rise tower in the Loop that was supposed to have Chicago’s largest co-living property is now at risk of foreclosure.

properties.HED: Here’s what tenants pay at HNA’s 1M sf Loop office tower
properties.DEK: 181 West Madison is HQ for Northern Trust and Berkshire Hathaway’s Marmon Group
properties.description_link: Three years ago, HNA Group paid $359 million for a Loop office tower at 181 West Madison Street, part of the Chinese conglomerate’s buying spree that included other trophy properties across the country.

properties.HED: Marc Realty plans another big hotel in Fulton Market
properties.DEK: Developer wants to build 296-key property; would add to 250-key complex eyed nearby
properties.description_link: Developer Marc Realty Capital wants to build a 296-key hotel in Fulton Market. It would be the second hotel project the company is eyeing in the trendy neighborhood.

properties.HED: Moceri + Roszak founders plan 383-unit Fulton Market tower
properties.DEK: Development would add to duo’s growing portfolio, which includes 214-unit Parkline tower
properties.description_link: A venture of development firm Moceri + Roszak is planning a 383-unit residential tower in Fulton Market.

properties.HED: Homewood golf course could be transformed into 800K sf logistics hub
properties.DEK: Owner of Calumet Country Club in Homewood seeks to take advantage of industrial market boom
properties.description_link: The owner of the 18-hole Calumet Country Club in Homewood is eyeing a massive transformation of the 130-acre golf course into a sprawling industrial park.

properties.HED: Kushner Cos to sell Chicago office tower at sharp discount
properties.DEK: Onni Group in contract to pay $188M, far less than its purchase price a dozen years ago
properties.description_link: UPDATED, November 12, 4:37 p.m.: Kushner Companies is close to a deal to sell its lone Chicago office building for $188 million, a significant discount from what the firm paid for the property over a dozen years ago.

properties.HED: Here’s what tenants pay at 601W Cos.’ Aon Center
properties.DEK: JLL, Edelman and Kraft Heinz all have HQs at 83-story Chicago tower
properties.description_link: When insurance brokerage Aon Corporation moved its global corporate headquarters from Chicago to London in 2012, it was seen as a “symbolic blow” to the city’s office market.

properties.HED: Waldorf Astoria Chicago going to Joe Mansueto at steep discount
properties.DEK: Billionaire entrepreneur paying $54M for luxury hotel, a year after its lender seized control of 215-key tower at foreclosure
properties.description_link: Billionaire entrepreneur Joe Mansueto is buying the Waldorf Astoria Chicago, a year after its lender seized control of the 215-key Gold Coast hotel in foreclosure proceedings.

properties.HED: Massive Gold Coast mansion hits market for $19M
properties.DEK: 20K sf home would smash existing record sale for neighborhood if purchased at the price
properties.description_link: Chicago area home sale prices have risen in recent months, but the owner of a massive Gold Coast mansion that just hit the market is shooting for a record.

properties.HED: Fifield’s scaled-back condo tower still rankles neighbors
properties.DEK: Developer eliminated 137 units and 14 stories from controversial Near North Side project
properties.description_link: Fifield Companies will chop 14 stories and 137 units off its proposed condominium tower on the Near North Side following complaints from the neighboring condo building.

properties.HED: Winnetka luxury market is riding high
properties.DEK: $7M home sale is latest indication buyers are beating a path to toney suburb
properties.description_link: A lakefront mansion in Winnetka sold for $6.5 million, the latest sign that luxury buyers are beating a path to the Chicago toney suburb.

properties.HED: Grant Park luxury resi tower sells for $190M; priciest multifamily deal of year
properties.DEK: Iconiq Capital bought 479-unit Essex on the Park
properties.description_link: Iconiq Capital paid $190 million for a new luxury apartment tower in Chicago’s Grant Park, marking the largest multifamily sale of the year.

properties.HED: This firm is tripling its office space in Downtown Chicago

properties.description_link: The story of the Chicago office market during the pandemic has been a grim one, as an increasing number of companies have exited leases or scaled back and listed space for sublease.

properties.DEK: Developer Fulton St. Cos. is testing the market

properties.HED: Privacy is the newest amenity
properties.DEK: Chicago’s high-end condo buyers and apartment renters are shifting their priorities in a Covid world, and are seeking out units with balconies, and communal spaces with plenty of room
properties.description_link: UPDATED, July 9, 5:01 p.m.: In a Covid world, privacy has become the ultimate amenity.

properties.DEK: Property was marked down by 45% earlier this month

properties.description_link: Shrugging off the current dismal state of Chicago’s office market, Vista Property Group plans to build a 15-story office building in the West Loop.

properties.DEK: No deals over $5M happened in 2019 in the suburban town
properties.description_link: A lakefront estate in Winnetka closed on Monday for $8.2 million, giving renewed hope to a high-end suburban market that has struggled to reach former heights.

properties.description_link: The Chicago area luxury market can be a fickle mistress.

properties.HED: JW Marriott is latest hotel at risk of default

properties.description_link: The financial stress the coronavirus has exacted on Chicago’s downtown hotels, whose occupancy rate hovers around 13 percent, has reached a crisis point for many.

properties.HED: Help wanted: Developer needed to buy $25M property, build tower

properties.HED: “King of the West Loop” could soon be facing a cash crunch
properties.DEK: Phil Denny’s real estate investment firm Peppercorn saw its $12.5M loan at 240 N. Ashland enter special servicing
properties.description_link: Real estate investor Phil Denny has a problem. One of his anchor tenants, the photo and video production arm of Crate & Barrel, just left his 80,000-square-foot building on the outskirts of Fulton Market. And the $12.5 million loan on the three-story property at 240 N. Ashland Avenue recently transferred to a Miami-based special servicer, according to Crain’s.

properties.HED: “It’s sad”: Sprawling Winnetka mansion unloaded for big loss

properties.HED: Tinley Park senior housing complex sells for $29M amid surge in inventory
properties.DEK: Chicago-based Focus Healthcare Partners, which sold the 150-unit Hanover Place Apartments, had paid $19M in late 2014
properties.description_link: UPDATED, Jan. 30, 11:48 a.m.: A real estate investment company that focuses on multifamily properties acquired a 150-unit senior living apartment complex in Tinley Park.

properties.HED: Hotels turn to day rates amid increasing competition
properties.DEK: The Hoxton is among two dozen Chicago hotels offering the afternoon rates to compete with short-term rentals, co-working companies and the flood of new rooms hitting the market
properties.description_link: An increasing number of hotels across Chicago — including the boutique variety — are offering day-rate rooms, pegging them as a co-working spinoff complete with bed and bathroom.

properties.HED: 476-key Fulton Market hotel project wins key approval
properties.DEK: North Park Ventures’ 21-story development, along with 2 other West Loop projects from Trammell Crow and Marquette Companies passed the planning commission this week
properties.description_link: Three development projects in the West Loop — including two in Fulton Market — snagged key approvals this week, as the flood of construction plans in that prime Chicago area continues.

properties.HED: With over 50 homes in the pipeline, developer rebrands area “the New West”
properties.DEK: Chicago developer Home& built the latest addition to “The 12” on a former site of a Chicago Public School
properties.description_link: The ghostly lot where a Chicago elementary school once sat is now the site of nearly 30 new homes that are part of the latest Chicago suburb development called “The 12.”
properties.geo_address: 12 development at 2500 W. Lexington St Chicago, IL

properties.HED: Akara Partners lands $57M refi on newly-built River North hotel
properties.DEK: The investment and development firm opened the 206-key hotel early last year
properties.description_link: Investment and development firm Akara Partners landed a $57 million refinance on its 206-key extended stay hotel tower in River North.
properties.geo_address: 2 Suites at 110 W. Huron Street Chicago, IL

properties.HED: In Chicago’s residential market, the price is not Wright
properties.DEK: Homes designed by fame architect Frank Lloyd Wright have been selling for less than comparable properties
properties.description_link: You would think that owning a home designed by perhaps the most famous American architect of all time would boost its value. But in Chicago’s residential real estate market, you would also be wrong.
properties.geo_address: 301 S. Kenilworth Ave., Elmhurst; 239 Franklin Street Chicago, IL

properties.HED: Portion Control: Inside the retail rightsizing of the Magnificent Mile
properties.DEK: Big vacant spaces are being broken up to accommodate retailers seeking smaller stores on High Streets
properties.description_link: Before Crate & Barrel vacated its flagship store on the Magnificent Mile, the landlord and leasing team considered a piecemeal strategy for the five-story, glass-ensconced building: chopping up the space to house multiple tenants.

properties.HED: Fulton St. Companies’ Alex Najem, the “largest smallest developer” in Chicago’s hottest ‘hood
properties.DEK: Co-founder talks about competing alongside the likes of Sterling Bay and Shapack Partners, and how his 3-year-old firm is laser-focused on Fulton Market.
properties.description_link: Alex Najem got his first taste of Fulton Market as a broker for Cedar Street Companies, when the development firm acquired and later sold a portfolio of four office and retail buildings.

properties.HED: Life sciences development may be Fulton Market’s next new thing
properties.DEK: Trammell Crow wants to build the 400K sf Fulton Labs, hoping to attract biotech companies to the popular district
properties.description_link: Fulton Market has become known for its trendy restaurants and bars, glass offices, hotels and luxury residential buildings.

properties.HED: How the sausage is made: Vienna Beef moving Chicago headquarters
properties.DEK: The hot dog maker will occupy the entire 42K sf building owned by Dayton Street Partners
properties.description_link: Hot dog producer Vienna Beef is relocating its headquarters to a recently-renovated industrial building on the Near West Side.

properties.HED: Can a $10M condo — not in No. 9 Walton — find a buyer?
properties.DEK: Seller of full-floor unit at 400 W. Huron hopes to buck trend of Chicago’s overall down luxury market
properties.description_link: Luxury home sales in Chicago took a tumble last year, but one seller is hoping 2020 will be a different story.

properties.HED: Tishman Speyer lands $81M loan for Fulton Market spec office project
properties.DEK: New York-based firm is partnering with local developer Mark Goodman & Associates on the 270K sf building
properties.description_link: New York-based developer Tishman Speyer has secured an $81 million loan for a 13-story office development that it is building on spec next to Google’s Midwest headquarters in Fulton Market.

properties.HED: Buyers to “Windy City Rehab”: Take back this broken $1.36M house
properties.DEK: Couple who purchased Lincoln Park townhouse from the show’s hosts say it is plagued with issues
properties.description_link: The owners of a $1.36 million home featured on reality show “Windy City Rehab” are suing the show’s hosts for fraud and demanding that they take back the property.

properties.HED: Fulton Market isn’t full yet: Developer plans new office building
properties.DEK: Shorewood Development Group wants to transform one of the neighborhood’s last remaining industrial sites, formerly owned by wholesaler Nealey Foods
properties.description_link: A suburban developer is the latest to want in on Fulton Market’s success, with plans for a new office building in the booming West Loop district.
